import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; const CreateProfile = (props) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '', }); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram, } = formData; const [dispalySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); const onChange =event=>setFormData({...formData,[event.target.name]:event.target.value}) return (

onChange(event)} /> Could be your own company or one you work for
Could be your own or a company website
City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{dispalySocialInputs && (
)} Go Back
); }; CreateProfile.propTypes = {}; export default CreateProfile;
